channel.title: Jenkins 相关的翻译 on SuRenPi
channel.description: Recent content in Jenkins 相关的翻译 on SuRenPi

item.description: 发布实验性版本的插件 查看可用的开发者指导 To simplify delivery of beta versions of plugins to interested users, the Jenkins project published an experimental update center. It will include alpha and beta versions of plugins, which aren’t usually included in the regular update sites. 创建试验性创建版本 Plugin releases that contain alpha or beta in their version number will only show up in the experimental update site. Note that it also serves regular releases, so the release of version 1.
